name: Space Taxi (itch) (ZiCKeZaCKe)
description:
One cubic planet, six individual worlds - quite hard to keep orientation, even as a taxi driver! Guide your passengers on the fastest route by following their UNLIKELY COMBINATIONS of directions.

CONTROLS:
Turn Left (A or LEFT ARROW)
Turn Right (D or RIGHT ARROW)

Note: I know that their are still some collider issues which can lead to falling off the planet into deep space. If you encounter this problem there is currently no way around restarting the game.
